org.json.stream

Interface LimitFilter


  • public interface LimitFilter
    Filtering for structures during a parse. Provided by the BuilderLimits class to the StructureBuilder implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptField(java.lang.String fieldName, JSONStreamReader.ParseState state, SizedIterable<StructureBuilder<?>> stack)
      Determine whether to accept or reject a value within an object.
      boolean acceptIndex(int index, JSONStreamReader.ParseState state, SizedIterable<StructureBuilder<?>> stack)
      Determine whether to accept or reject a value within an array.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptIndex

        boolean acceptIndex(int index,
                    JSONStreamReader.ParseState state,
                    SizedIterable<StructureBuilder<?>> stack)
        Determine whether to accept or reject a value within an array.
        Parameters:
        index - the array index within the current array
        state - the type of value that will be built
        stack - can be used to construct a JSON Pointer expression, or determine the depth of the current structure
        Returns:
        true to allow the value to be created, otherwise false to skip the value
        See Also:
        JSONPointerUtils.toJSONPointer(Iterable)

      • acceptField

        boolean acceptField(java.lang.String fieldName,
                    JSONStreamReader.ParseState state,
                    SizedIterable<StructureBuilder<?>> stack)
        Determine whether to accept or reject a value within an object.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the key name within the current object
        state - the type of value that will be built
        stack - can be used to construct a JSON Pointer expression, or determine the depth of the current structure
        Returns:
        true to allow the value to be created, otherwise false to skip the value
        See Also:
        JSONPointerUtils.toJSONPointer(Iterable)
